@WillMurphy8 @MaryMcAuliffe4 @ucddublin And particular thanks to Ruth, Eimear, Trish and all the staff at the Centre for Cross Border Studies in Armagh who did so much behind the scenes. Cross border cooperation in action. Looking forward to #universitiesireland 2018 in Belfast!

Hanna Sheehy Skeffington very pro-European in her outlook when lobbying US politicians in 1918 Washington. How very avant garde in #brexit context! She had an audience with Woodrow Wilson. @MargaretWard1 #UniIrl2017 #historians1917 https://t.co/mpTmFMrs5m

Hanna Sheehy Skeffington a very shrewd operator in her US propaganda tour. Crucially she understood her rights including free speech which she didn’t enjoy in UK. #UniIrl2017 #historians1917 https://t.co/gLohIyL8oB
Censorship and propaganda. Great paper by @MargaretWard1. Very careful reading of the texts and their publication history. #UniIrl2017 #historians1917 #universitiesireland https://t.co/U6cnYnVoc4

Fantastic paper on Hanna Sheehy Skeffington now by @MargaretWard1 @QUB_History right now at @UniIreland. Really looking forward to reading Margaret’s new book about Hanna’s writings #historians1917 #UniIrl2017 https://t.co/kWYiDU44BD

Only one person died in entire Irish prison system from Spanish Flu! Amazingly, it was the safest place to be! Great paper by Ida Milne @ucddublin. #TheMoreYouKnow #historians1917 #UniIrl2017 https://t.co/MD2eTotx73
